ComicInfo.Series: Nira X: Cyberangel - Cynder: Endangered Species
ComicInfo.Summary:
Abducted by aliens, both Nira-X and Cynder are taken to planet Lofkan, once the home of a great Olympic arena where, 1000 years ago, over 14 civilized worlds competed in. Since then, it disintegrated into a cesspool where abducted warriors battle solely for the entertainment of the emperor Janus Kor Prime. Mentally influenced by the emperor, Nira-X and Cynder battle each other in the arena. When the emperor shifts his control to a nearby dragon, Nira-X and Cynder break free from the mental control and use the dragon to hurl the emperor from his pilar to his death below. Having beaten the tournament, Nira and Cynder are allowed to leave.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-04 18:28:22. [CVDB254812]
